subject: Re: getting rid of mkproto.sh from Samba3
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

James Peach wrote:

> Yep. My plan was to do a "make headers", check in the 
> result and remove the proto generator roles and scripts.
> Once that is done, I/we can gradually start paring the
> proto.h files down into well-defined interfaces.

James,

I am in full agreement but I think we should pursue this
in the SAMBA_3_0 as I think it likely that we'll have a
few false starts on getting things in place.

+1 from me.




jerry
